message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $130. I think it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob, but $130 is already a competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about we try $110?
